trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_SEQ_00<tab>The haunted look in Raubahn's eyes speaks volumes...
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_TODO_00<tab>Aid the wounded.
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_TODO_01<tab>Bring Meffrid's charm to Conrad.
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_YSHTOLA_000_015<tab>...
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_MEFFRID_000_035<tab>...
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_RAUBAHN_000_040<tab>See to the wounded, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. If they live, help them. If not, move on.
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Meffrid lies motionless, having breathed his last. Clenched in his fist is a small charm, which you take for safekeeping.
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_WISCAR_000_061<tab>He was already cold when I got to him... There was naught I could do. That charm must've been important. You'd best take it to Conrad.
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_WISCAR_000_062<tab>Godsdammit Meffrid... Weren't you the one telling me to use my head and stay alive...
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>You spare another moment for Meffrid, before turning away. Fishing in your pockets, your hand closes around his charm. Conrad must be told.
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_ALISAIE_000_075<tab>Heh...heh heh... You seem ready to burst into tears. I'd...fetch you a handkerchief, but...
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>Damn it, Alisaie! This is serious! You need rest!
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_PIPIN_000_085<tab>It makes no sense. He brushed us aside as if we were nothing...
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_KRILE_000_090<tab>You're worried about Y'shtola, aren't you? <sigh> It's too early to make any kind of prognosis, but...she's alive. For now.
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_LYSE_000_095<tab>If it wasn't for her, it'd be me lying there... <var 1A 02 /var>...I wish it was.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_CONRAD_000_100<tab>M'naago? Meffrid? Where are you...?
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_CONRAD_000_110<tab>This...this is...
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_CONRAD_000_111<tab>...He's dead, isn't he.

TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_CONRAD_000_112<tab>Meffrid was a worrier. Always thinking about others before himself. He once had an imperial patrol chase him nigh on twenty malms so that his wounded would have time to escape...

TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_CONRAD_000_113<tab>His comrades loved him for it, of course...though that only made him worry more. Did you know that he sent his men in Quarrymill away because he thought they were fighting for him, and not the cause? Aye, well, he did. The only life he was willing to risk was his own, you see.
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_CONRAD_000_114<tab>But that's exactly the kind of man who should be leader! The kind of man who deserves to survive. Not a...not an old fool who's all used up.
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_ALPHINAUD_000_115<tab>...There's no logic to it, Master Kemp. There never is.

TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_ALPHINAUD_000_116<tab>Who stands, who falls... In the heat of battle, we can but do our best─as he did. Meffrid will be sorely missed, aye...but because of his sacrifice, many now live who otherwise would not─and they need us, now more than ever.
TEXT_STMBDA134_02464_CONRAD_000_117<tab>Aye...aye, that they do. Forgive me. I had...high hopes for him, is all...
